Karen C. Fahle

To:      Elena Kagan/OPD/EOP

Subject:         Erskine letter

Hi Elena. I sent you a letter from Rep. Lucille Roybal-Allard last Tuesday
as Erskine wanted a response prepared for him. The subject of the letter
deals with the Family Violence Option.  Is a letter in the works? Thanks.

                                                                Hex-Oump Conversion
DRAFT REPLY TO CON OR. LUCILLE ROYBAL-ALLARD
FROM ERSKINE BOWLES



        Thank you for writing to me and to John Hilley** about the Family Violence Option that
was in the Senate reconciliation bill. As you know, the conferees did not include the Senate
provision in the final bill. We plan to examine the issue of waivers for victims of domestic
violence as part of the regulatory process for the welfare law, and hope to be able to provide
needed flexibility while preserving the welfare law's strong emphasis on work.

       Thank you again for writing.,




**Roybal-Allard sent an identical letter to Hilley. Perhaps one reply could be sent?
